Camera - Class in engine
Represents a 2D camera that defines a viewport into a larger world space.
Camera(double, double, int, int) - Constructor for class engine.Camera
Constructs a camera at the specified world coordinates with a given view size.
canCraft(Recipe, Inventory) - Static method in class util.CraftingManager
Determines whether the given recipe can be crafted with the provided inventory.
centerOn(double, double) - Method in class engine.Camera
Centers the camera on a given world position (targetX, targetY).
checkTransitions(Player) - Method in class engine.level.LevelManager
Checks if the player has moved beyond level boundaries and transitions to the previous or next level if available.
clearAll() - Method in class engine.save.SaveLoadManager
Deletes all save files (inventory and savegame).
craft(Recipe, Inventory) - Static method in class util.CraftingManager
Performs crafting by consuming the required ingredients from the inventory and adding the crafted item to the inventory.

Utility class providing crafting functionality based on defined recipes and player inventory.
